content: Don't be afraid, go straight on, 'cause no one knows what the future holds. Past regrets and loneliness. I gave it a lot of thought to see the light. I must go on for all time and never return! I have to say goodbye and it's breaking my heart forever. I wish to carry on, but there's so many places in this world. I'm following my destiny, crossing the valleys, the seven seas all over the earth and I'm swearing on my honour to dethrone the prince of the world.
author: Heavenly
